name: Damn Lost Chicken
description:
The game is made in 2D sideways, similar to an endless runner. In the game you have to dodge the enemies and find the feathers in order to find the lost chicken at the end.

When an enemy hits you, you lose one life. In total you have 3 lives. When you run out of lives you go back to the start menu.

In the start menu you can change the difficulty, as well as the character.
